channel.title: v3.0.3 on XSpec
channel.description: Recent content in v3.0.3 on XSpec

item.title: Release XSpec v3.0.3
item.description: Release XSpec v3.0.3 Release v3.0.3 upgrades its connections with related software. Support for testing Schematron schemas now uses SchXslt as the built-in Schematron implementation. XSLT code coverage is compatible with Saxon 12.4 or later. These are the highlights of XSpec v3.0: Common to Languages Under Test XSpec is tested with Saxon 12, 11, and 10, while use of Saxon versions earlier than 12.4 is not recommended. XSpec no longer supports Saxon 9.
